group_1.narration: We were playing a game of beach flags!@Tsuruno and Felicia were the last two left@and were about to go head-to-head...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, but Felicia's close behind and going@really fast!

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno's buried in the sand, not moving...

group_1.textCenter: Best of three, please! It's the finals,@after all!

group_1.textRight: Nah, that's fine with me! I'll beat ya as@many times as ya want!

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna turn that sass of yours into@regret!

group_1.narration: Tsuruno wasn't about to give up, but...
No matter how hard she tried...

group_1.textRight: B-but my road to becoming the Mightiest!

group_1.textLeft: You're not aiming to be the mightiest@beach flags player, Tsuruno.
Uh oh. Looks like that set her off...
It's no wonder they call her the Duelist.

group_1.textRight: I'm the flag, so the person who captures me@and knocks me down is the winner!
If I manage to escape, I win!

group_1.textLeft: Hey now! This is way too sudden!

group_1.textCenter: Wow, incredible... They're so far away@already.

group_1.textLeft: Tsuruno's really serious. Felicia isn't@gaining on her at all...

group_1.textRight: Wow, they ran all the way to the far end...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, they're headed back this way.

group_1.textCenter: Huh? Hang on... Tsuruno and Felicia are@running towards us at full speed...
I can't just stop when I'm going this...

group_1.textRight: And Rena got caught up in the crash!

group_1.textLeft: Now that the matter's settled, why don't@we head back to the beach house?

group_1.textRight: Hey! Get off of me already, Tsuruno!

group_1.textLeft: I'm tired from all the running.
Huh? I'm feeling so sleepy all of a@sudden...
Sorry, lemme take a quick nap...

group_1.textRight: H-hey! What the heck! Don't lie down here!

group_1.narration: So...@Those were the highlights of our first day!
Tomorrow, our vacation will start for real!@I can't wait!
